cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY' OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY',S GOVERNMENT.CONFIDENTIAL. CABINET.C.P.494. RE-OPENING OF TRADING RELATIONS with' ' Note by 8 A a' Maurice HankeyThe Prime Minister has authorised the setting up of an Inter-Departmental Committee to co-ordinate the action of the various departments concerned in the scheme approved by the Supreme Coun-cil of the Allies in Paris for the re-opening of Trading Relationswith the Russian people. The Committee will be composed as follows:Mr.E.F*Wise, British Representative, Permanent Committee,Supreme Economic Ccuncil (In the Chair):A Representative of the Treasury:A Representative of the Foreign Office:A Representative of the Board of Trade:A Representative of the Department of Overseas Trade:A Representative of the Ministry of Shipping:A Representative of the War Office:A Representative of the Admiralty:Mr.Ibbetson James, (Secretary)..(sgd) M.P.A.Hankey,Secretary, Cabinet *2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W*,Jan .23, 192?..
